name: Unbox 3D
description:
The most satisfying unboxing game ever.
Get lost in the oddly satisfying experience of unwrapping hundreds of awesome objects, complete with brain-pleasing ASMR sound.

Tap and slide to cut the tape around the box. Slide up to open. Tap on the opened box to pick up and admire what you've opened! There are hundreds of different boxes to open with tons of objects to find!

FEATURES:
- ASMR sound. Enjoy quality sound & relax
- Hundreds of boxes to open: cardboard, phone case, gift, toolbox, shoebox, wooden box... So many possibilities!
- Thousands of objects to discover!
- Oddly satisfying
- Relax
- Free to play
- Simple gameplay
